Posts.Content: Evening Dreamthief, Thank you for responding with so much information.   I am having my 4th cycle of Doxorubicin and Cyclophosphamide tomorrow.  Then cycles 5 to 8 are Docetaxel and Pertuzumab and 18 cycles of Herceptin (which is an injection).  I was expecting I may loose my toenails with the Doxetaxel on cycles 5 to 8 but was quite shocked when after cycle 3 my finger nails started to turn black.  My toes are fine at the moment. A big thank you again for all the other helpful advice. Take care, Ann156.x
Posts.Title: Hand nails turning black from chemotherapy. Any advice please?

Posts.Content: Hi Maggiemee, Thank you for your help.  Will see what I can find.  Take care.xxx
Posts.Title: Hand nails turning black from chemotherapy. Any advice please?

Posts.Content: I am having chemotherapy for breast Cancer and my hand nails have started to turn black.  Been told by my Oncologist to get some natural black or dark nail varnish.  Has this happened to anyone and can they suggest where I can get it from.  Also is there anything else I can put on my hands and nails to help drying out around the nails.  Thank you.
Posts.Title: Hand nails turning black from chemotherapy. Any advice please?

Posts.Content: Hi Leolady56, Thank you for telling me about wide spectrium antibiotic. I have googled that and is says Ampicillin is a broad spectrium antibiotic.  I will look into that further.  Thanks again.  Take care.x
Posts.Title: Hand nails turning black from chemotherapy. Any advice please?

Posts.Content: Evening Karen234, Thank you for replying.  I have not heard of massaging Vicks Vapour rub into your nails but will give it a go.  Thanks again.  Take care.x  Ann156
Posts.Title: Hand nails turning black from chemotherapy. Any advice please?
